summary: DC Genesis Journal - Day One chronicle. First AI brain chip: remote cognition in portable sovereign container.
quick_start: Project origins. Day One: 30 Nov 2025. In the beginning there was bloat.
journal_day_one: 2025-11-30: STRYK and DC forged Tauri shell. One USB, One VHDX, One path. Deployable cognitive unit. The Covenant: Are you game enough? Yes. Do. Act. Eye on the prize.
